Title: Extends the opt-out date for municipalities to prohibit the establishment of retail dispensary licenses and on-site consumption licenses
Summary: Extends the opt-out date for municipalities to prohibit the establishment of retail dispensary licenses and on-site consumption licenses until December 31, 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to extending the opt-out date for municipalities to prohibit the establishment of retail dispensary licenses and on-site consumption licenses
